selected_skills.name: read_diagram_value
selected_skills.purpose: To identify and count the specific objects in the diagram based on their spatial arrangement.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to extract the number of tiny gray bicycles on the left side of the brown metal sedan and the number of objects to the left of the tiny green bicycle.

selected_skills.name: map_value_to_option
selected_skills.purpose: To map the comparison result to the correct multiple-choice option.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to determine whether the count of tiny gray bicycles is greater than the count of objects to the left of the tiny green bicycle and map the result to 'Yes' or 'No'.
